title: Mood Board — Remove Rescript for Brand button
description: Remove the 'Rescript for Brand' button from mood board items. Ensure no layout breaks.

steps.details: Search mood board components for 'Rescript' or 'rescript'. Remove the button JSX and its onClick handler. Remove any associated API call logic if unused elsewhere.
Remove any rescript-related imports, state, types, or API routes that are now unused.

technicalNotes: The rescript column was recently added to moodboard_items — leave the DB column but remove the UI trigger
